title: Game crashed overnight, now can't launch
body:
Running Windows 10, on a desktop PC. Last night, I put my computer to sleep and ended up going to bed, so I forgot to shut it down. I woke up this morning and the LoL client had crashed (was using the beta). I couldn't launch it at all, because it told me the files were corrupted. Ok - I uninstalled both the beta and the old client, reinstalled them... but now it just doesn't work. I don't seem to actually be patching - it takes all of 5 seconds, and I know patches take longer - and when I hit the Play button, the first window disappears, but the login screen never comes up.

What's next?

replies.body: Update: I reinstalled again, and this time, when given the prompt to upgrade to the beta client, I declined it. After that, it patched properly and I was able to launch. Not sure why trying to download the beta client broke the patching.

I'm glad everything is at least working on the legacy.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help figure out why there's issue with the upgrade.  It would also help to download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach some logs for more context.  We'll get back to you!

It sounds like there might have been an issue with installation or updates for the updated client, and could't launch anymore.  A [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) would fix this up, which seems to be the case for you.  I'm glad to hear everything is okay now!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PfFh1mNQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-14T18:43:16.517+0000)
>
> It sounds like there might have been an issue with installation or updates for the updated client, and could't launch anymore.  A [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) would fix this up, which seems to be the case for you.  I'm glad to hear everything is okay now!

I think the beta client is breaking my ability to launch the game. I played successfully yesterday. Today, I wanted to go back to the beta client so I clicked Upgrade Now and download it. I never actually got any download or anything to install, and now I'm having the same problem with the login screen never opening when I press launch.
